name: Got a Match? (Simone Cicchetti)
description:
Game made for the Weekly Game Jam week 55.

Theme: "Got a Match?"

Keep the giant machsticks lit in this long night, or else monsters will take the village over. Careful not to leave them on for too long though, or they'll burn down the very village you want to protect. 

Game made by Simone Cicchetti and Alessandro Mattozzi.
